TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_bayu, title = bayu, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/bayu} }

S.FORM: == bayu == yadah ku lalacan i bayu. bayu 1.海 pitabukudan nu tatama ku bayu.海是男人撒網的地方. bayuay 1.鹹水的 akiken kiya nu bayuay a buting! 去烤鹹水魚！
== bayo == yadah ko lalacan i bayo. bayo 1.海 pitabokodan no tatama ko bayo.海是男人撒網的地方. bayoay 1.鹹水的 akiken kiya no bayoay a boting! 去烤鹹水魚！
